Talk_01_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Well, <sp:5:0:0>I...<sp:5:0:0> How do I say this...<sp:5:0:0> You told me
that already.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But I'm happy you tried.<sp:5:0:0> Thank you!<sp:0:4:0>Just let me know if you find out what's on
the slabs in the remaining ruins.
Talk_01_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat>I feel bad about asking you to find all this
out for me, since you're sightseeing too...<sp:0:4:0>But we're so close now. I need to know
what each one of the slabs say!
Talk_01_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Y'know, <sp:5:0:0>you're a good kid to take the
time to tell me about all this.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>I'd never be able to take a look at it all
myself with my fear of heights.
Talk_01_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I can get a good look at the floating ruins,
and they told me what the slab inside
it said...
But I'm still frustrated that the other
<clr:0000>four Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> are up so high.
Talk_01_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Thank you for telling me about that slab!<sp:5:0:0>
Truly fascinating stuff.<sp:0:4:0>Just <clr:0000><sp:2:2:2a:24004e0075006d004f0066004e006f00740054006f006c00640050006c006100740065007300ffff00cd><clr:ffff> left. I can only imagine what
discoveries lie in store.
Talk_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Heh. <sp:5:0:0>They're only the most amazing
sight to see in Hyrule.<sp:0:4:0>Of all the ruins that fell everywhere,
these ring-shaped wonders are only in
this village. Five of them!
They've found a <clr:0000>stone slab with Zonai
writing<clr:ffff> in four of the ruins.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Those ancient messages are the main
reason I came to this village!
Talk_01_18: <sp:3:0:2:0701>So that was the fourth one?<sp:5:0:0> I see...
0002: I read what's on a slab.
Talk_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So did you visit the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0> I would
if I wasn't scared of heights.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>No one is allowed to visit the one ruin
that's floating above the village.<sp:0:4:0>But if you've read one of the <clr:0000>slabs<clr:ffff> in any
of the<clr:0000> other four Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, tell me what
it says!
Talk_01_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Wait a second.<sp:0:4:0>If you look at all of these slab messages
together...don't they sort of read like
<clr:0000>one single message<clr:ffff>?
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>You don't think...<sp:5:0:0> Could the <clr:0000>rest<clr:ffff> of the
message be on a slab in the floating
Ring Ruin?!
But why?<sp:5:1:0> Hmm...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, this is impossible. <sp:5:0:0>Trying to figure this
stuff out is making my head hurt.
Talk_01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>With all those Ring Ruins falling out of the
sky, you'd hope just one more would have
the decency to float near the ground.
But no. <clr:0000>All four of the other ruins<clr:ffff> landed
way up high. I take one step up towards
them and break out in a cold sweat.
It's not fair! I want to know what <clr:0000>those
stone slabs say<clr:ffff>...
Talk_00_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll be checking out the shops around
here. If you see me again, say hello!
Talk_01_03: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>What?!<sp:5:0:0> You went to see them for me?<sp:0:4:0>So...<sp:5:0:0>what did they say?
Talk_01_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, well. At the end of the day, I learned
a little something about our history.<sp:0:4:0>Thank you for everything!<sp:0:4:0>From one sightseer to another, I'd like
to reward you with one of my personal
favorite travel necessities.
Talk_00_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The problem is...<sp:5:0:0>I have an extreme fear
of heights. My legs start shaking if I'm
even on the second floor of a house.
And every Ring Ruin fell somewhere
high up...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>One of the ruins is floating above part
of the village, so at least I can see it
from below. 
The other four though? Forget about it.
I can't even get close.<sp:0:4:0>I wish I could find out <clr:0000>what's on the stone
slabs <clr:ffff>in each of those ruins...
Talk_01_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those are <clr:0000>thunderwing butterflies<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I caught these unusual insects on my
travels through the Faron region. They
only come out in the rain!
You can boil them with monster parts to
make an elixir that grants you resistance
to electricity.
Remember that! It'll come in handy on
your travels, take it from me.<sp:5:0:0> All right,
then, I'll see you around!
Talk_01_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Back in ancient Hyrule, people called
"sages" protected the kingdom... I see...<sp:5:0:0>
How fascinating.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I bet those sages were nearly as strong
and wise as Princess Zelda herself.
Talk_00_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The problem is...<sp:5:0:0>I have an extreme fear
of heights. My legs start shaking if I'm
even on the second floor of a house.
And every Ring Ruin fell somewhere
high up...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>A survey-team member told me what was
on the stone slab in the ruin that used to
be off-limits.
But what's on each of the <clr:0000>slabs in the
other four Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>? My curiosity's
killing me!
Talk_01_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So in this ancient battle, the king and
all the sages fought the Demon King, but
they couldn't defeat him.
Still, they tried to leave a glimmer of hope
behind for the people of the future—
for us.
That's really something.<sp:5:0:0> Huh.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>H-hey, you don't think the Upheaval is
some kind of sign of the Demon King's
resurrection, do you?
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Ha...ha... <sp:5:0:0>It c-<sp:5:0:0>can't be, right? I must be
overthinking things.
Talk_01_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Hm? <sp:5:0:0>Your pouch is full!


Darn it. I was going to give you the <clr:0000>three
thunderwing butterflies <clr:ffff>I caught in Faron<sp:5:0:0>.<sp:0:4:0>I do want to thank you,<sp:5:0:0> so come back
when you have the space to take 'em!
Talk_00_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Heh. <sp:5:0:0>They're only the most amazing
sight to see in Hyrule.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Of all the ruins that fell everywhere,
these ring-shaped wonders are only in
this village. Five of them!
They've found a <clr:0000>stone slab with Zonai
writing<clr:ffff> in every single one.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Those ancient messages are the main
reason I came to this village!
Talk_01_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There were once people blessed by wind,
fire, water, and lightning...<sp:5:0:0>as well as time
and light.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>And these people used "secret stones" to
amplify their powers... Wow.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>They must have had some pretty amazing
rocks way back when, huh?
Talk_01_24: <sp:3:0:2:0700>You free up space in your pouch?<sp:0:4:0>Then here's what I wanted to give you!
Talk_01_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So it's not enough to be exceptional—
you need a secret stone to be a sage...<sp:5:1:0>
Or so it seems, at least.<sp:0:4:0>But what is a secret stone?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>If it's that special, I'm sure its beauty
would put a diamond to shame.
Talk_01_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Your pouch is still full, there.<sp:0:4:0>I was hoping to give you the <clr:0000>three
thunderwing butterflies<clr:ffff> I caught in Faron.<sp:0:4:0>Come back when you've made room!
Talk_01_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You had a chance to see more?<sp:5:0:0>
Wh-what was written on them?
Talk_01_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> You know what's written on the
stone slates?<sp:5:0:0> That's amazing. I could
never climb to such a high, uh...height.
I have so much respect for you.<sp:0:4:0>So, uh...<sp:5:0:0> Wh...<sp:5:0:0>what did they say?
Talk_01_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>You'd think some of the<clr:0000> Ring Ruins <clr:ffff>would
have landed close to the ground...<sp:0:4:0>But, no, every single one had to fall way
up high. Ugh, heights are the worst.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>The researchers told me what the <clr:0000>slab<clr:ffff>
in the floating Ring Ruin said, but <clr:0000>I wish
I knew the contents of the other four<clr:ffff>.
Talk_01_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Did you visit the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0> I would if I
wasn't scared of heights.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>A member of the survey team told me
what was written on the slab in the
Ring Ruin that floats above the village.<sp:0:4:0>But if you've read one of the slabs in any
of the other four Ring Ruins, tell me
what it says!
Talk_01_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's great that you can see the <clr:0000>floating
Ring Ruin <clr:ffff>from relatively close, even if
it is sealed off.
But why do <clr:0000>the other four<clr:ffff> have to be
so distressingly high up?

I just want to know <clr:0000>what's written on
their stone slabs<clr:ffff>...
Talk_01_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Wait a second.


If you put all that together with what the
survey-team member told me about the
slate in the floating Ring Ruin...
it all forms a <clr:0000>single message<clr:ffff>! <sp:5:0:0>So this
sage Mineru...is offering us some sort
of clue to...<sp:5:1:0> Hmm...<sp:0:4:0>Ngh...<sp:5:1:0> <sp:3:0:2:0a01>Oh, I give up. I can't do this.<sp:0:4:0>All this puzzle-solving stuff makes my
head hurt.
Talk_01_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>So, <sp:5:0:0>uh... <sp:5:0:0>Whenever you're ready...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh.<sp:5:0:0> So you don't have a slab to tell me
about, huh?<sp:0:4:0>If you tell me what's on each one of
those, I'll give you a reward.<sp:0:4:0>Maybe...<sp:5:0:0>something special I take with
me whenever I travel.
Talk_01_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks so much for that!<sp:0:4:0>Only <clr:0000><sp:2:2:2a:24004e0075006d004f0066004e006f00740054006f006c00640050006c006100740065007300ffff00cd> <clr:ffff>left. What secrets do you think
we'll learn?
